properties.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 11 at 7:44PM EST until January 12 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg SC
properties.description:
TORNADO WATCH 17 REMAINS VALID UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT FOR THE
FOLLOWING AREAS

IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES

IN NORTHEAST GEORGIA

ELBERT                FRANKLIN              HART
STEPHENS

IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 12 COUNTIES

IN PIEDMONT NORTH CAROLINA

CLEVELAND

IN WESTERN NORTH CAROLINA

AVERY                 BUNCOMBE              BURKE
CALDWELL              HENDERSON             MCDOWELL
MITCHELL              POLK                  RUTHERFORD
TRANSYLVANIA          YANCEY

IN SOUTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES

IN UPSTATE SOUTH CAROLINA

ABBEVILLE             ANDERSON              CHEROKEE
GREENVILLE            GREENWOOD             LAURENS
OCONEE                PICKENS               SPARTANBURG
UNION

THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBEVILLE, ANDERSON, ASHEVILLE,
ASHFORD, BANNER ELK, BEREA, BOYDVILLE, BREVARD, BURNSVILLE,
BUSICK, CALHOUN FALLS, CANON, CEDAR MOUNTAIN, CELO, CLEMSON,
CLINTON, COLUMBUS, DACUSVILLE, DANA, DYSARTSVILLE, EASLEY,
EAST FLAT ROCK, ELBERTON, ETOWAH, FERO, FLETCHER, FOREST CITY,
FORK SHOALS, FORTSONIA, FRANKLIN SPRINGS, GAFFNEY, GLENWOOD,
GRANITE FALLS, GREENVILLE, GREER, GUMLOG, HARTWELL,
HENDERSONVILLE, INGALLS, KINGS CREEK, KINGS MOUNTAIN, LAURENS,
LAVONIA, LENOIR, LITTLE RIVER, MARION, MAULDIN, MICAVILLE,
MIDDLETON, MILL SPRING, MONARCH MILLS, MORGANTON, MOUNTAIN REST,
NEBO, NEWLAND, NINETY SIX, NUBERG, OAKWAY, PATTERSON,
PLEASANT GROVE, POPLAR, RAMSEYTOWN, REED CREEK, ROYSTON,
RUCKERSVILLE, RUTHERFORDTON, SALUDA, SAWMILLS, SENECA, SHELBY,
SIMPSONVILLE, SPARTANBURG, SPINDALE, SPRUCE PINE, SUGAR HILL,
SWISS, TAYLORS, TOCCOA, TRYON, TUXEDO, UNION, VALDESE, WALHALLA,
WARE SHOALS, AND WESTMINSTER.
